title: The Best of friends
creator_credit: Tom Jeffrey, New South Wales Film Corporation, Friendly Film Productions and Michael Robertson
brief_description: Angela Punch McGregor and Graeme Blundell star as two old school friends who have known one another since childhood, and have shared personal triumphs and crises. Overnight, their relationship dramatically changes from friends to lovers. A once beautiful relationship is threatened, and the complication of an unexpected pregnancy throws them both into a spin! A light romantic comedy with a strong supporting cast including Ruth Cracknell, Henri Szeps and Mark Lee.
